modName: Siverlight Black armor with Pink feathers and gems
summary: Silverlight armor recolored Black armor and Pink feathers and gems
descriptionHtml:
This is a recolor of Jojjo\'s Silverlight armor. Black armor with Pink feathers and gems. This mod REPLACES Jojjo\'s armor. You need to download his armor first and than install and overwrite with mine.

Required! 
Jojjo\'s Silverlight armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251

Install:
Put into Data folder and overwrite all or use NMM to overwrite

Please endorse if you like it.

Many thanks to jojjo for his hard work of creating the armor and for the permission to release the recolor :D
author: M0S3S
